name: gtfs-sequelize
description: A model for the static GTFS using sequelize.

scripts.test: npm run test-download && npm run test-mysql && npm run test-mysql-spatial && npm run test-postgres && npm run test-postgis && npm run test-sqlite
scripts.cover-all: npm run cover-download && npm run cover-mysql && npm run cover-mysql-spatial && npm run cover-postgres && npm run cover-postgis && npm run cover-sqlite && npm run merge-coverage
scripts.codeclimate: npm run cover-all && npm run codeclimate-send
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
